attributes.description: For those looking for a small luxury car that can both dominate a winding mountain road and cruise the highway in complete comfort, you are defiantly looking at the right car. The 2016 BMW 2 Series is one of the few cars able to strike the perfect balance between luxury and sportiness. The civilized ride is firm but never harsh, even with the adjustable dampers in their most aggressive setting. the 2 Series behaves like any other small luxury car. But when the road gets twisty, the 2 Series comes alive. Its precise steering inspires confidence The 2,0-litre turbodiesel makes a similar 135 kW, but a far more impressive 380 N.m of torque from a lowly 1 750 r/min.E&OE
